person.persName: John M. Hewitt, Jr. (Franklin County, Kentucky, lawyer and soldier)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John M. Hewitt and Mildred Hewitt. Resident of Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seventeen enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Resident of Franklin County in 1860. Household owned nineteen enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860. Served in Battery B of the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as captain from October 8, 1861, to November 16, 1864.
